forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a muted palette of soft grays and twinkling hints of light signals the day's spirit. The familiar blanket of clouds lingers, hinting at the low fog that often plays a gentle game with the silhouettes of the cityscape. A gentle west-southwest wind whispers through the streets, merging the cool embrace of the marine layer with the warmth of the day. Though the sun will soon rise to claim its authority, the lingering clouds may shade its brilliance, inviting a touch of contemplative solitude for those who wander in the morning hush.

Expect a shift this afternoon as the day brightens. The sun will make its presence felt, lifting temperatures to a comfortable 69 degrees before settling back down to a más subdued 66 as evening approaches. While layers will remain essential—an elegant sweater or a light jacket will minimally suffice amid the ever-changing moods of San Francisco's weather—the allure of a pleasant stroll or a delightful coffee al fresco becomes inviting. Today is one for quiet explorations; perhaps a visit to a lesser-traveled park, or finding a seat at a charming bistro to watch the world unfold, all while the brisk air sharpens the senses in the golden moments of a late summer’s day.
